channel.title: [Release] AlwaysOn
channel.description:
Well, today I found an old post made by "FerIsKing" about a program that restarts your server if it is offline, but I noticed that he didn't release it. I made something like this a while ago, so I was thinking.. Why not edit it a bit and release it?
[s]So here it is..: Pic: [img]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/Alwayson.jpg[/img] Click [url=http://uppit.com/d5y62wkufgpn/AlwaysOn.exe]here[/url] to download it!
I made this quickly because I have to go :I[/s]
If you have any hints to improve it, please post (:
First put the IP, Port & Path of the run.bat (click the "Select Path" button) in the Settings window before you Start!
[b]---EDIT--- Newer version:[/b] -Saves settings -Option to change interval -Black -Some bugs fixed
Click [url=http://uppit.com/5h991au0g6tm/AlwaysOn.exe]here[/url] to download it! Pic:[img]http://i47.photobucket.com/albums/f168/nevercme/alwayson2.jpg[/img]
[b]I don't know why, but you always have to select the path first (Click the button) & save.[/b]

item.title: [Release] AlwaysOn
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Java Is My Bitch, post:19, topic:355843”][quote author=John459 link=topic=452388.msg3315577#msg3315577 date=1282284470]
Programs like these should not be needed. It it sad that they are…
[/quote]Hyperion is crash-able, in fact i can crash that server on a beastly DEDI server with a legit DoS utility.
I honestly think that java isn’t fit to run a uncrashable server.[/quote]If you could make the server read ID’s and block them before accepting the socket it might be possible to make it uncrashable. Until then, we just need to stick to reducing the lag as much as we can by removing blocked socket connections ASAP.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] AlwaysOn
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

accually sorry but there is a bug. just found it, it keeps restarting ur server like every 30 secs. not everytime it goes down. think u can fix really can use this.30
I don't know why, but you always have to select the path first (Click the button) & save.
I'll fix that error in the next version, if I make one.. ---

You could easily just add a conditional to a server loop that does the same thing, rather than making a pointless VB program.

Well, then this program is for the ones that don’t know how to do that (:

I don't see how that is being a cunt? If anyone was a cunt, it was John, but everything he said was true.
If programs like these weren't made then maybe people would be more motivated to make their own servers
Sorry, but imo that sounds ridiculous..

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] AlwaysOn
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“DemisePking, post:15, topic:355843”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=452388.msg3342997#msg3342997 date=1284566465]
Don’t realease something unless it works, and we have enough restarters anyway.

You could easily just add a conditional to a server loop that does the same thing, rather than making a pointless VB program.
[/quote]

Your a cunt, I hope you know that.
@Topic looks good nice that you spent time on something like this[/quote]Huh?

I was reading the topic:

accually sorry but there is a bug. just found it, it keeps restarting ur server like every 30 secs. not everytime it goes down. think u can fix really can use this.30
And summarizing. It's not like I was saying 'crappy programming' or 'this is shit' or anything derogatory in the first sentance.

In the seconds sentence, I was pointing out how this could be done without the use of an external program.

I don’t see how that is being a cunt? If anyone was a cunt, it was John, but everything he said was true.

Read full topic

item.title: [Release] AlwaysOn
item.dc:creator: @VbCoder VbCoder
item.description:
@VbCoder wrote:

[quote=“John459, post:12, topic:355843”][quote author=VbCoder link=topic=452388.msg3315680#msg3315680 date=1282294396]
@Krackkid: This doesn’t restart every 30 minutes or something, it only restarts when the server goes offline…

@John459: Well, just in case if it ever happens, the AlwaysOn restarts your server…
And a lot servers out there null sometimes, so they can use this…
[/quote]
If programs like these weren’t made then maybe people would be more motivated to make their own servers because the other shit ones would be unable to run.[/quote]
Well, sorry then that i ruin private servers by making a program like this… o:

Read full topic

also since it’s a .exe i thought i would virus scan it for you. and its clean so good job.

Well, today I found an old post made by “FerIsKing” about a program that restarts your server if it is offline, but I noticed that he didn’t release it.
I made something like this a while ago, so I was thinking… Why not edit it a bit and release it?

Click here to download it!

I made this quickly because I have to go :I[/s]

If you have any hints to improve it, please post (:

First put the IP, Port & Path of the run.bat (click the “Select Path” button) in the Settings window before you Start!

Newer version:

-Black
